09 Apr 2012

Anxious? Maybe this is why

By in category

I moved to Toronto in ’96 with a fresh degree in advertising design from a great institution and program, and was relatively bright eyed and cheery about my opportunities.

I got a gig at Saatchi, and started my morning walks across downtown Toronto.

It wasn’t long before several things about the experience started to conflict with my values, but I’ll never forget realizing that I’d started to put my head down as I was walking to work. The visual cacophony of marketing message blinking and blathering were wrecking a perfectly pleasant walk. They also, as much as anything, set me on the career path I’ve been on since.

I saw this video this morning and felt like it was chicken soup for my values.

The fact is that while plenty of media power has shifted to consumers, there’s also a lot more media over all. It’s probably worth re-watching this from time to time.

About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
